cause.description:
My name is Linda and I have been suffering with tinnitus for 2 years now...it's time to make and end to it.
Tinnitus is the perception of ringing, buzzing, roaring, or other noises in the ears or head – when there is no external source of the noise. Millions of People world wide sufferers with this debillitating disorder and we need to help find a cure. PLEASE recruit as many people as you can....TINNITUS suffers are counting on you!
The ATA's website for more on tinnitus is http://www.ata.org/ Click on the "About Tinnitus" link on the top left
THANK YOU SO MUCH FOR YOUR SUPPORT EVERYBODY!
1. To educate people about tinnitus
2. Tinnitus must end immediately
3. It is a great cause helping millions get reief
cause.mission: Raise enough money for the American Tinnitus Association (ATA)
cause.name: TINNITUS AWARENESS
